title: Andrew Adonis – 2021 Comments on the Personal Conduct of Matt Hancock
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Andrew Adonis on 25 June 2021.
content: Let’s be clear about the issues here. People in power shouldn’t appoint their lovers to jobs. Public money shouldn’t be spent on paying a lover. And it’s unacceptable for the Health Secretary to tell the country it’s against the law to even hug and then do this.
